briefdescription.para: CFS Health and Safety (HS) application entry point.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Health and Safety application entry point and main process loop.

briefdescription.para: Initialize the CFS Health and Safety (HS) application.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Health and Safety application initialization routine. This function performs all the required startup steps to initialize HS data structures and get the application registered with the cFE services so it can begin to receive command messages.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function performs the steps required to setup the cFE software bus for use by the HS application

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function performs those steps required to initialize the relationship between the HS App and the cFE Table Services.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function performs the normal Health and Safety monitoring functions including application, event and execution counters, as well as servicing the watchdog, outputing the aliveness indicator, and receiving commands or HK requests.

briefdescription.para: Process commands received from cFE Software Bus.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function pulls messages from command pipe and processes them accordingly.
